## CacheEvict() function

Decorating the execution of this method will trigger a cache clear operation. CacheStore server config defined in db.ts.


**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function CacheEvict(cacheName: string, opt?: CacheEvictOpt): (target: any, methodName: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => PropertyDescriptor;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

cacheName


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

cacheName cache name


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

opt


</td><td>

[CacheEvictOpt](./koatty_cacheable.cacheevictopt.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ cache options e.g: { params: \["id"\], delayedDoubleDeletion: true } Use the 'id' parameters of the method as cache subkeys, and clear the cache after the method executed


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

(target: any, methodName: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) =&gt; PropertyDescriptor
